name: Panda Warrior - Kungfu Samurai
description:
+++ 24-hour discount 100% FREE! Are you the Panda Champion? +++

“Amazing Game play”
“Striking Features”
“Addictive Game”
_______________________

Panda Warrior is one amazing game! In this great game, you must train your panda before you start the game. The main purpose of the game is, to collect as many fruits as you can.

Tap on the screen to change directions. Escape from the black spots. They will slow your speed, and your panda could fall. You can also challenge your friends and earn a high score. Don’t miss the opportunity to play this game. Download it today!

+++ Game Features +++

“Train your Panda”
